function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of partition walls between parking bays allows for easy adaptation of large car parking areas into smaller educational spaces, potentially leading to overcrowding and congestion.","Impact":"Increased risk of congestion and overcrowding in adapted smaller educational spaces, leading to reduced air circulation and increased potential for contagion transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement clear zoning and partitioning strategies to create distinct spaces within the adapted areas, reducing congestion and improving air circulation.","Technologies":"Use of partition walls, zoning guidelines, and spatial planning tools to create designated spaces within the adapted areas.","People":"Occupants of adapted smaller educational spaces, planners, and administrators responsible for the adaptation.","Owner":"Planners, architects, and administrators overseeing the adaptation process."},{"Description":"Right-angle parking configuration may lead to inefficient circulation and traffic flow within the adapted spaces, increasing congestion and reducing air quality.","Impact":"Inefficient circulation and traffic flow can lead to congestion, reduced air quality, and increased risk of contagion transmission in the adapted spaces.","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive traffic flow and circulation planning, considering the impact on air quality and contagion transmission.","Technologies":"Use of traffic flow simulations, spatial analysis tools, and circulation planning software to optimize traffic flow in the adapted spaces.","People":"Occupants of adapted spaces, traffic planners, and administrators responsible for the adaptation.","Owner":"Traffic planners, architects, and administrators overseeing the adaptation process."},{"Description":"Lack of proper consideration for air circulation and ventilation in adapted parking spaces may lead to increased risk of contagion transmission.","Impact":"Inadequate air circulation and ventilation can lead to increased risk of contagion transmission within the adapted parking spaces, jeopardizing the health and safety of occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation assessments and design interventions to ensure adequate airflow and air exchange in the adapted spaces, considering the potential for contagion transmission.","Technologies":"Use of ventilation analysis tools, HVAC systems, and air quality monitoring devices to assess and improve air circulation in the adapted spaces.","People":"Occupants of adapted spaces, architects, and administrators responsible for the adaptation.","Owner":"Architects, engineers, and administrators overseeing the adaptation process."}]}
